nodes.text: Vaale was a city on the planet Dianth, constructed out of living bone. The city was designed by The Architects of Vaale, who created numerous other artifacts including the Rings of Vaale, which supposedly provided their wearer with great power. The living bone matter contained a security system set in place by the Architects which emitted frequencies that targeted brain waves. The security system went rogue, driving the population of Vaale mad and causing the collapse of Dianth's society.

The rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra visited the city alongside a crew after the Shadow University student Detta Yao hired her to find the Rings of Vaale, but were pursued by mercenaries working for the Tagge family scion Ronen Tagge, who also wished to acquire the artifacts. Aphra and her team managed to find one of the Rings, which was subsequently stolen by her associate Just Lucky, who had been working for Tagge. After Lucky and the mercenaries left Vaale, Tagge's fleet destroyed the city.
